name: GAMEMASTER (LOVEPIZZAINC.)
description:
GAMEMASTER is an experimental adventure game.

Your goal is to explore the facility in order to obtain a keycode, which will allow you to escape! There are many strange and familiar faces that lay within this place, don't be shy.

Controls are as follows:
WASD - Move
Space - Jump
E - Interact
F - Flashlight
LMB - Throw object
ESC - Pause (settings available through here!)

Credits:
Jefftastic - Programming, artwork, writing
Postman - Artwork
Piskitu - Newman sprites
blameitontherobot - Writing, suggestions
Sinclair - Some textures
Emilio Coppola - the Dialogic plugin for Godot (it really rocks)

Made in the Godot Engine! <3
